name: Peeb Adventures - Demo
description:
Peeb goes on a comedic adventure to escape the back-code of his game after being banished by a mysterious entity... Will he succeed?

Swing around in this retro-styled third-person platformer as the titular Peeb, solving puzzles and navigating obstacles with your trusty grappling hook...

Can you find all of the secret worlds and easter eggs?

Check out the HPS1 demodisk!

Get the Soundtrack!

SCHEME GRAPPLE INTERACT MOVE LOOK JUMP Keyboard + Mouse Left-Mouse E WASD Mouse Spacebar Xbox Controller Left Trigger X Left Analog Stick Right Analog Stick A  

CREDITS:

Game Creator, 3D Artist, Etc: John Ellis

Monkey Constructor: Timothée Dessallien 

Composer, Cover Artist: Ben Drury

Composer, Peeb Designer: Aaron Green

QA: Cyreides, Bryce Bucher, Minnie and Micah
